songs.title: Normal, You Were
songs.lyrics:
Remember how lonely you were?
Remember how normal you used to be?

Waking right up from a narrow dream
All your sweat has bed head soaking
Normal, you used to be!
Normal, you to me!

Fingering all the flowers
Fingering all the constant struggling over the swing
Sunny side up on your plate
Your mother would drive you away
Normal, you to me!
Normalising me!

Falling soldiers fly feeling life let go
Dragon over shores feeling life... let go

People of the minds that fold
People with the folded shame
Going to home to smell the air
Remember how normal you were
People love the glory hole
Remember how normal you were

Growing stump-lettes show
Heartfelt blessing heals
Falling soldiers know
"Judgers will be judged"

Lovers stomachs wind fishing to come back
Normal, once, we were
Normal, once, we were

We run
